name: Watch Your Step! (xehanort)
description:
Watch Your Step is a small game created specifically for ZenoZam 2020. Currently, it is only 2 levels long and without music, all of which will soon be taken care of.

2 Levels, the same goal; reach the end. But can you always see the path? Are there obstacles on your way that block a seemingly easy passage? Well, sometimes you see them, sometimes you don't...

HOW TO WIN

Reach the yellowish platform at the end of each level to complete it! Right now, there is a bug with the end screen of Level 2 (it does not restart the game), it will be fixed soon.

HOW TO PLAY

  • WASD or arrow keys to move the player. Keep in mind that, effectively, you can move towards exactly 8 directions: up/down, left/right, and the 4 diagonals. Have that in mind when things get tricky and timing seems to be of the essence...
  • Space to jump
  • Esc to pause/unpause the game
  • Mouse to move the camera around
  • Mouse wheel to zoom in/out

This is the first non-tutorial game I make, I am waiting for your feedback and your time/death scores! Post some screenshots from your level completions, that would be amazing!

Have fun!

(I used sound clips from freesound.org for the SFX)
